FuncDef: This command configures whether AS path length is considered in the selection of the best BGP route for a prefix.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the AS-path length is ignored for all unlabeled unicast IPv4 routes.
Specifies that the AS-path length is ignored for all unlabeled unicast IPv6 routes.
Specifies that the AS-path length is ignored for all labeled-unicast IPv4 routes.
